topics.body:
I was dragged to watch Maleficent and while it's not that good, it's not bad either... The closest thing I can compare it to is tot he Godzilla '98 film-WAIT!

Yes, as a Godzilla movie is awful and it totally misses the point of what Godzilla is supposed to be, but if you pass that, it's not  abad monster flick, and you actually find it entertaining in some parts, so it's not that much of hating the movie, as much as hating the name it's associated with. This one has the same problem. 

It's not entirely bad, but there are several big issues with it and my suspension of disbelief can only go so far.

I don't regret seeing it, but for a movie about Maleficent (Who was one of the first villains I was introduced) it's pretty underwhelming considering the potential it had.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body: I remember when me and my family were cleaning out our shed at our old house my step dad screamed *"OH SHIT!"*, turns out there was a banana spider just staring at him the whole 30 minutes he was in there.
